content.thinking: Let me analyze this Colombian business registration certificate document systematically following the extraction requirements. First, I need to count the pages by analyzing the document structure. Looking at the bookmarks at the bottom of each page, I can see "PAGINA: 1", "PAGINA: 2", up to "PAGINA: 10". So this document has 10 pages. Now let me extract the company information: From the document, I can see: - Company Name: "SOLOSOFT S A S" (from span 1-3) - Company Type: "S A S" (Sociedad por Acciones Simplificada) - Country: Colombia (indicated by "CAMARA DE COMERCIO DE BOGOTA") - Tax ID: "800.211.407-1" (from span 1-4) - Identification Type: "N.I.T." (from span 1-4) For the main address, I see: - "DOMICILIO : BOGOTÁ D.C." (from span 1-4) - From span 1-5, I see "DIRECCION COMERCIAL : CARRERA 7 NO 156-68 OF 801" and "MUNICIPIO : BOGOTÁ D.C." So the main address would be "CARRERA 7 NO 156-68 OF 801, BOGOTÁ D.C." For dates: - Document Issue Date: "2022/01/27" (from header, span 1-1) - Incorporation Date: From span 1-7, "SE CONSTITUYO LA SOCIEDAD COMERCIAL DENOMINADA SOLOSOFT LIMITADA" with date "20 DE OCTUBRE DE 1.993, INSCRITA EL 28 DE OCTUBRE DE 1.993" - Registration Number: "MATRICULA NO: 00571554 DEL 28 DE OCTUBRE DE 1993" (from span 1-5) - Last Registration Renewal Date: Occurred on March 31, 2021, as noted in the document - Company Duration: The organization is set to operate until October 20, 2043 I've standardized the key dates in a consistent YYYY-MM-DD format for easier reference and analysis. The registration details confirm the company's long-standing presence in the Colombian business landscape. The registration number is 00571554, and the enterprise is classified as a Microempresa, indicating its small-scale operational status. Key representatives include: - Primary Manager: Abraham Mosquera Jacobo (ID: 8692953) - Alternate Manager: Claudia Duran Lizarazo (ID: 51618230) Fiscal oversight is provided by: - Principal Fiscal Reviewer: Lina Paola Alvarez Suarez (ID: 1019070460) - Alternate Fiscal Reviewer: Rodriguez (partial information available) - Juridical Fiscal Reviewer: Synergy Consultores Auditores S.A.S. (Tax ID: 9001164481) No liquidation or embargo details were found in the document.
